title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 340.2 - Statement of reasons for rejection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 340.2 - Statement of reasons for rejection

State Regulations

For purposes of Executive Law section 296-a(4)(a), a
statement of the specific reasons for rejection of an application for credit
shall be deemed to be in compliance with this section if it is a clear and
meaningful statement of all of the factors which justified
rejection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
340.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
